FeatureItem.Name: Data Binding
FeatureItem.Description: This section contains pages that allow you to bind the grid control to data, bind the current view's columns to data fields or create unbound columns.

FeatureItem.Name: Card Layout
FeatureItem.Description: The pages in this section allow you to customize the size, order and other layout aspects for cards, card fields and value cells.

FeatureItem.Name: Sorting
FeatureItem.Description:
Quick customization button's visibility: [{(OptionsView.ShowQuickCustomizeButton=False)}OptionsView.ShowQuickCustomizeButton] property.
Disable / enable sorting for particular fields: [{goto:Columns,OptionsColumn.AllowSort}Column.OptionsColumn.AllowSort] row property.
Sort order for a field: [{goto:Columns,SortOrder}Column.SortOrder] row property.

FeatureItem.Name: Filtering
FeatureItem.Description:
Quick customization button's visibility: [{(OptionsView.ShowQuickCustomizeButton=False)}OptionsView.ShowQuickCustomizeButton] option.
Filter panel's visibility: [OptionsView.ShowFilterPanelMode] option.
Allow Filtering: [{goto:Columns,OptionsFilter.AllowFilter}Column.OptionsFilter.AllowFilter] option.
Enable / disable the current filter condition: [ActiveFilterEnabled] property.

FeatureItem.Name: Editing
FeatureItem.Description: The pages in this section allow you to specify settings for data editing.

FeatureItem.Name: Focus, Selection, Navigation
FeatureItem.Description: The pages in this section allow you to specify settings for focus movement, selection and navigation.

FeatureItem.Name: Master-Detail
FeatureItem.Description: The pages in this section allow you to customize how the view and its details work in master-detail mode.

FeatureItem.Name: Appearance
FeatureItem.Description: The pages in this section allow you to specify the look and feel (paint style) for the entire grid control or just the currently selected view. They also enable you to change the style of individual view elements. For a list of all the visual elements available along with their appearance settings, refer to the [{gotoFeature:VE_Main}Visual Elements] section.

FeatureItem.Name: Visual Elements
FeatureItem.Description: This section contains pages that describe how to change the visibility, appearance and size of visual elements provided to you by the grid control and the currently selected view.

FeatureItem.Name: Behavior
FeatureItem.Description: The pages in this section allow you to change how the view performs particular operations.

FeatureItem.Name: End-user Actions
FeatureItem.Description: The pages in this section provide settings that control the availability of particular actions to end users and events that provide notifications about actions performed.

FeatureItem.Name: Printing
FeatureItem.Description:
This page provides access to all the settings available for customizing printing. You can also access the printing settings which relate to a particular visual element. See the [{gotoFeature:VE_Main}Visual Elements] section for this purpose.
Print styles enabled: [OptionsPrint.UsePrintStyles].

FeatureItem.Name: General Settings
FeatureItem.Description:
Interval between cards: [CardInterval] property.
Maximum number of cards to display vertically and horizontally: [MaximumCardRows] and [MaximumCardColumns] properties.

FeatureItem.Name: Fields
FeatureItem.Description:
Visibility and order: [{goto:Columns,Visible}Column.Visible,] [{goto:Columns,VisibleIndex}Column.VisibleIndex] properties.
Automatic field height: [{(OptionsBehavior.FieldAutoHeight=False)}OptionsBehavior.FieldAutoHeight] option. In effect when a memo or picture editor is assigned to a column's [{goto:Columns,ColumnEdit}ColumnEdit] property.
Suppress empty fields: [{(OptionsView.ShowEmptyFields=False)}OptionsView.ShowEmptyFields] option.

FeatureItem.Name: Card Width
FeatureItem.Description:
Card width: [CardWidth] property.
Automatic card width: [{(OptionsBehavior.AutoHorzWidth=False)}OptionsBehavior.AutoHorzWidth] option, [MaximumCardColumns] property.

FeatureItem.Name: Card Collapsing and Expanding
FeatureItem.Description:
Availability: [{(OptionsBehavior.AllowExpandCollapse=False)}OptionsBehavior.AllowExpandCollapse], [{(OptionsView.ShowCardCaption=False)}OptionsView.ShowCardCaption], [{(OptionsView.ShowCardExpandButton=False)}OptionsView.ShowCardExpandButton] options.
Prevent particular cards from being expanded / collapsed: [CardExpanding], [CardCollapsing] events.
Expanding / collapsing notifications: [CardExpanded], [CardCollapsed] events.

FeatureItem.Name: Filter Dropdowns
FeatureItem.Description:
Filter dropdowns are shown when filter buttons are clicked. They allow end users to filter columns by the value of a particular column or to specify a custom filtering condition.
Content: [OptionsFilter.ShowAllTableValuesInFilterPopup] and [OptionsFilter.ColumnFilterPopupMaxRecordsCount] properties, [ShowFilterPopupListBox] event.
Size: [OptionsFilter.ColumnFilterPopupRowCount] property.
MRU list: [OptionsFilter.AllowColumnMRUFilterList], [OptionsFilter.MRUColumnFilterListCount] options.
(Custom) item behavior: [OptionsFilter.UseNewCustomFilterDialog] property, [CustomFilterDialog] event.

FeatureItem.Name: Filter Panel
FeatureItem.Description:
The filter panel displays the currenly applied filter criteria, allows you to enable, disable or cancel the current filter and provides access to the most recently used filter conditions.
Provide an indication when the view is filtered: [OptionsView.ShowFilterPanelMode] property.
Appearance: [Appearance.FilterPanel], [Appearance.FilterCloseButton] properties.
MRU filter conditions: [{(OptionsFilter.AllowMRUFilterList=False)}OptionsFilter.AllowMRUFilterList], [OptionsFilter.MRUFilterListCount], [OptionsFilter.MRUFilterListPopupCount] properties.
Printed appearance: [AppearancePrint.FilterPanel] property.
Manual painting: [CustomDrawFilterPanel] event.
Related features: [{gotoFeature:Feature_Filtering}filtering].

FeatureItem.Name: Detail View Settings
FeatureItem.Description:
If this view is a detail: Detail synchronization: [{(SynchronizeClones=False)}SynchronizeClones] property.
Size when expanded: [DetailHeight] property.

FeatureItem.Name: Field Caption
FeatureItem.Description:
Visibility: [{(OptionsView.ShowFieldCaptions=False)}OptionsView.ShowFieldCaptions] option.
Appearance: [Appearance.Card], [Appearance.FieldCaption], [{goto:Columns,AppearanceHeader}Column.AppearanceHeader] properties.
Content: [{goto:Columns,Caption}Column.Caption,] [{Images}Images,] [{goto:Columns,ImageIndex}Column.ImageIndex,] [{goto:Columns,ImageAlignment}Column.ImageAlignment,] [{goto:Columns,OptionsColumn.ShowCaption}Column.OptionsColumn.ShowCaption] properties.
Manual painting: [CustomDrawCardField], [CustomDrawCardFieldCaption] events.
Appearance when printed: [AppearancePrint.Card], [AppearancePrint.FieldCaption] properties.

FeatureItem.Name: Cell
FeatureItem.Description:
Appearance: [Appearance.Card], [Appearance.FieldValue], [{goto:Columns,AppearanceCell}Column.AppearanceCell] properties.
Size: [CardWidth] property.
Manual painting: [CustomDrawCardField], [CustomDrawCardFieldValue] events.
Custom alignment: [RowCellDefaultAlignment] event.
Appearance when printed: [AppearancePrint.Card], [AppearancePrint.FieldValue] properties.

FeatureItem.Name: Hints
FeatureItem.Description: Automatic cell hints: [{(OptionsView.ShowFieldHints=False)}OptionsView.ShowFieldHints].

FeatureItem.Name: Card Caption
FeatureItem.Description:
Visibility: [{(OptionsView.ShowCardCaption=False)}OptionsView.ShowCardCaption] option.
Appearance: [Appearance.CardCaption] property.
Content: [CardCaptionFormat] property, [CustomCardCaptionImage] event, [{gotoFeature:VE_ExpandButton}expand buttons.]
Manual painting: [CustomDrawCardCaption] event.
Visibility and appearance when printed: [OptionsPrint.PrintCardCaption], [AppearancePrint.CardCaption] properties.

FeatureItem.Name: Expand Buttons
FeatureItem.Description:
Visibility: [{(OptionsView.ShowCardExpandButton=False)}OptionsView.ShowCardExpandButton] property.
Appearance: [Appearance.CardExpandButton] property.

FeatureItem.Name: Focus
FeatureItem.Description:
Appearance when the control is focused: [Appearance.FocusedCardCaption] property.
Appearance when the control is not focused: [Appearance.HideSelectionCardCaption] property.

FeatureItem.Name: Selection
FeatureItem.Description:
Availability: [{(OptionsSelection.MultiSelect=False)}OptionsSelection.MultiSelect] option.
Appearance when the control is focused: [Appearance.SelectedCardCaption] property.
Appearance when the control is not focused: [Appearance.HideSelectionCardCaption] property.
Notifications of selection changes: [SelectionChanged] event.

FeatureItem.Name: Scroll Buttons
FeatureItem.Description:
Availability: [VertScrollVisibility] property (if cards don't fit into the view vertically).
Appearance: [Appearance.CardButton], [CardScrollButtonBorderStyle] properties.

FeatureItem.Name: Separators
FeatureItem.Description:
Separator visibility: [{(OptionsView.ShowLines=False)}OptionsView.ShowLines] option.
Appearance: [Appearance.SeparatorLine] property.
Behavior availability: [{(OptionsBehavior.Sizeable=False)}OptionsBehavior.Sizeable], [{(OptionsBehavior.AutoHorzWidth=True)}OptionsBehavior.AutoHorzWidth] options.

FeatureItem.Name: Customize Button
FeatureItem.Description: Visibility: [{(OptionsView.ShowQuickCustomizeButton=False)}OptionsView.ShowQuickCustomizeButton] option.

FeatureItem.Name: In-place Editors
FeatureItem.Description:
Assign editors to columns: [{goto:Columns,ColumnEdit}Column.ColumnEdit] property.
Visibility of the editor buttons : [ShowButtonMode], [{goto:Columns,ShowButtonMode}Column.ShowButtonMode] properties.

FeatureItem.Name: Focus
FeatureItem.Description:
Focus movement options: [OptionsBehavior.UseTabKey], [OptionsBehavior.AutoFocusNewCard] options.
Focus change notifications: [FocusedRowChanged], [FocusedColumnChanged] events.

FeatureItem.Name: Horizontal Scrollbar
FeatureItem.Description:
Availability: [{(OptionsView.ShowHorzScrollBar=False)}OptionsView.ShowHorzScrollBar] option.
Position change notifications: [TopLeftCardChanged] event.

FeatureItem.Name: View Appearance
FeatureItem.Description: This page provides access to all the settings available for customizing the appearance of this view. You can also access the appearance settings which relate to a particular visual element. See the [{gotoFeature:VE_Main}Visual Elements] section for this purpose.

FeatureItem.Name: Sorting
FeatureItem.Description:
Sort mode: [{goto:Columns,SortMode}Column.SortMode] property.
If "sort by display text" mode is enabled, the text can differ from the edit values if: A particular editor is assigned: [{goto:Columns,ColumnEdit}Column.ColumnEdit] property. Custom text is supplied manually: [CustomColumnDisplayText] event.
If custom sort mode is enabled: The sorting algorithm is supplied via the: [CustomColumnSort] event.

FeatureItem.Name: Filtering
FeatureItem.Description:
Quick customization button: [{(OptionsView.ShowQuickCustomizeButton=False)}OptionsView.ShowQuickCustomizeButton] option.
Filtering availability: [{goto:Columns,OptionsFilter.AllowFilter}Column.OptionsFilter.AllowFilter] option.
Filter change notification: [ColumnFilterChanged] event.

FeatureItem.Name: Sorting
FeatureItem.Description:
Quick customization button: [{(OptionsView.ShowQuickCustomizeButton=False)}OptionsView.ShowQuickCustomizeButton] property.
Sorting availability: [{goto:Columns,OptionsColumn.AllowSort}Column.OptionsColumn.AllowSort] options.
Sorting notifications: [StartSorting] and [EndSorting] events.

FeatureItem.Name: Scrolling
FeatureItem.Description:
Availability: [VertScrollVisibility], property (if cards don't fit into the view vertically). [{(OptionsView.ShowHorzScrollBar=False)}OptionsView.ShowHorzScrollBar] option.
Position change notification: [TopLeftCardChanged] event.
